name: XenoCore's Exploration Game
description:
Explore and look around, see all there is to see. A laidback game where you discover new locations at your own pace.

Read all the ““““witty”””” descriptions there are to see in the game. There’s one for each location, as well as beautiful stock images lovingly placed in every corner of the game.

This is my capstone project. Game in progress.
The project files are available for free, game made in Godot.
